name: Chakra test
author: Vikas Ratudi

sections.description:
Welcome to chakra test create your question logics and give the user a chakra test.

It make your page conversion/traffic rate much higher.

Try now it’s free

You can suggest us if you want to add any addon features.

Here is the demo: click here

Need help in chakra creation check out our tutorial here: click here

Features

  • Easy To use
  • Edit/ delete Features
  • Add Question Groups
  • Add Questions
  • Add Question Inputs

Notes

chakra test is absolutely free, positively the most beginner friendly for WordPress. It is both easy and powerful.

Please feel free to follow me on Instagram for latest updates: Follow.

If you have any suggestion/query just email us at:) vforminfo@gmail.com.
sections.faq:
Who should use Chakra Test?

If you want a questionaire regarding you chakra test you can create you own and show it to user and make more conversion on you website.

Can i ask for a addon feature?

Yes, Ofcourse please Contact us at vforminfo@gmail.com

What should I do when I experience any problem?

Contact us at vforminfo@gmail.com
